description:
About:
“Coordination Day” is a half-day event held by LXDAO on November 10 in Bangkok, Thailand. With the theme of organization and coordination, it aims to bring together public goods builders, researchers, communities, academia, the public sector, foundations, etc. in a collaborative space for discussions, talks, and workshops.

Theme at Devcon:

Organization and Coordination: How to Achieve Optimal Coordination Solutions through Ethereum?

Topics:

  • Establishing collaborative cooperation for public goods projects between Web2 and Web3 developers
  • Sustainable funding mechanisms for public goods: How different economic models and token incentive mechanisms should better support public goods
  • DAO governance and decision-making coordination: How DAOs coordinate through their governance models to maintain the operation of the entire community and its projects?
  • Web3 empowers rural construction: In the context of rural revitalization, how can Web3 technology be implemented to empower rural construction
  • Balancing open-source projects and commercial interests: How to balance business and its interests while ensuring open source and decentralization
  • Cross-community collaboration: How to coordinate collaboration models between different communities to enhance cooperation efficiency among them
  • Fair distribution of Profits: Explore effective mechanisms to achieve fair profit distribution in Ethereum
  • Conflict and coordination between EIP and ERC: How to effectively coordinate and resolve potential conflicts between EIP and ERC during the standardization process to ensure the maximization of community interests


Organizer of the Event :

  • LXDAO is an R&D focused DAO to support valuable Web3 Public Goods and Open Source sustainably.
  • Join our Telegram and Twitter for learn more about LXDAO
